posts.post_content:
Anybody need a Snodgrass?  Let me know what you have to trade...here's what I need:

T205/T206 Sovereigns
T207
1963-64 Parkies
1980-81 OPC Hockey
1992-93 UD Hockey Inserts

Cheers,
Geno
